description: A farmer pens a confession admitting to his wife's murder, but her death is just the beginning of a macabre tale. Based on Stephen King's novella.

title: ​Maj Rati ​​Keteki
description: A successful writer returns to the town that launched his career, encountering people who spark nostalgic, often painfully illuminating flashbacks.

title: ​Mayurakshi
description: When a middle-aged divorcee returns to Kolkata to visit his ailing father, long-buried memories resurface, bringing new discoveries with them.

title: 1 Mile to You
description: After escaping the bus accident that killed his girlfriend, a high school student channels his grief into running, with the help of a new coach.

title: 12 ROUND GUN
description: Dealing with personal demons and the death of his son, a prizefighter attempts a return to the ring by challenging his rival to a 12-round rematch.

title: 6 Days
description: When armed gunmen seize the Iranian Embassy in 1980, a tense six-day standoff ensues while elite British soldiers prepare for a dangerous raid.

title: A Christmas Prince
description: Christmas comes early for an aspiring young journalist when she's sent abroad to get the scoop on a dashing prince who's poised to be king.

title: A Ghost Story
description: Following a fatal car crash, a man's spirit remains stuck in the home he shared with his wife as doors into the past and future begin to open.

title: A Sort of Family
description: An Argentine doctor faces legal and ethical challenges when she travels to the countryside to pick up the infant she has been waiting to adopt.

title: Aftermath
description: After an air traffic controller's mistake results in a tragic accident, a man who lost his wife and daughter seeks answers from the man responsible.

title: Ajji
description: When her small granddaughter is sexually assaulted by a powerful man and no justice is served, a poor, frail old woman plots her violent revenge.

title: Alaska Is a Drag
description: Tormented by bullies, an aspiring drag star working at an Alaskan cannery becomes a skilled fighter and is tapped for competition by a boxing coach.

title: All About Love
description: An inseparable couple struggles to stay together when betrayal threatens to tear their lives apart.

title: All of You
description: Two strangers meet on a dating app and experience instant chemistry, but their relationship unravels as jarring differences catch up to them.

title: All The Reasons To Forget
description: A Brazilian man tries a myriad of ways to get over his breakup with his girlfriend but is surprised to learn it's more difficult than he anticipated.

title: AllI Wish
description: Over a series of birthdays, a happy-go-lucky, commitment-averse fashion designer strives to bring a bit of calm to her chaotic love life.

title: Amar
description: Young Laura and Carlos experience the intensity and fragility of first love, as life realities gradually tarnish their idealized notions of romance.

title: An Imperfect Murder
description: Haunted by a nightmare involving her abusive ex-boyfriend, an actress begins to question her reality and whether the incident took place.

title: An Ordinary Man
description: A war criminal in hiding begins to suspect that the maid, his only confidant and contact with the outside world, may be hiding something herself.

title: Anarkali of Aarah
description: After being sexually harassed by a drunken politician while performing at a public event, a village dancer plots revenge to clear her name.

title: Anchor and Hope
description: Kat and Eva’s happy romance hits a rough patch when Eva decides that she wants a child. Visiting friend Roger could help complete their family.

title: Angamaly Diaries
description: After growing up amidst the gang wars of his hometown, Vincent forms an entrepreneurial squad of his own and ends up on the wrong side of the law.

title: Ayana
description: With his carefree bachelor days behind him, a young entrepreneur’s ambitions for adulthood come with some painful personal and professional decisions.

title: B.A. Pass 2
description: A young woman eager to avoid an arranged marriage moves to Mumbai, where she learns hard truths about show business, life and love.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion (Hindi Version)
description: To avenge his father's death, a young man leads an army into battle against a cruel tyrant in this Hindi conclusion to the historic saga.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion (Malayalam Version)
description: To avenge his father's death, a young man leads an army into battle against a cruel tyrant in this Malayalam conclusion to the historic saga.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion (Tamil Version)
description: To avenge his father's death, a young man leads an army into battle against a cruel tyrant in this Tamil conclusion to the historic saga.

title: Bad Genius
description: A top student gets pulled into a cheating racket with increasingly higher risks and even higher rewards. But she may lose much more than she gains.

title: Band Aid
description: A young married couple tries to save their disintegrating relationship by turning their fights into songs, with the help of an oddball neighbor.

title: Bareilly Ki Barfi
description: When she falls in love with the author of a novel she adores, bohemian Bitti enlists the help of a local printer to find her new object of affection.

title: Before I Fall
description: Forced to continually relive the day she dies in a car crash, a privileged high schooler must unravel the cosmic mystery of her suddenly looping life.

title: Bhasmasur
description: In this heart-wrenching coming-of-age story, a young boy embarks on an arduous trek with his debt-ridden father to sell their beloved family donkey.

title: Bhouri
description: A 23-year-old girl who's married to a man more than twice her age is forced to contend with the predatory nature of a male-dominated society.

title: Bilu Rakkhosh
description: Torn between his demanding corporate career, his passion for music and his turbulent family life, a man struggles to keep his inner demons in check.

title: Bitch
description: Cracking under the demands of children and a philandering, thankless husband, an overworked suburban mother assumes the persona of a ferocious dog.

title: Black Snow
description: An old tragedy and lingering animosity erupt when a man returns to Patagonia to convince his estranged brother to sell the family's isolated property.

title: Bokeh
description: After learning they are the sole survivors of an eerie apocalypse, a young American couple on vacation in Iceland ponder their love and the future.

title: Bottom of the World
description: En route to a fresh start in Los Angeles, young couple Alex and Scarlett stop over in a sleepy Southwestern town that loosens their grip on reality.

title: Burning Sands
description: Promising student Zurich opens his eyes to some hard truths when his fraternity's violent hazing escalates into a disastrous hell night.

title: Camp Cool Kids
description: A young boy attends summer camp, where he overcomes his fears, stands up to bullies and learns important lessons about faith and life.

title: Can't Help Falling in Love
description: Gab is eager to tie the knot with her handsome boyfriend, but there's a problem, and it's a doozy: She's already married to a total stranger.

title: Candyflip
description: On the incandescent shores of Goa, a young man tumbles down a mind-bending – and soon dangerous – series of trips after taking hallucinatory drugs.

title: Cappuccino
description: Richi is a director of commercials whose computer memory drive is accidentally switched with that of Sneha, a woman he soon falls in love with.

title: Carbon
description: On the verge of losing his business, an entrepreneur launches a carbon tax scam that thrusts him into a web of criminals, intrigue and murder.

title: Celebrity Marriage
description: A successful actress with an abusive husband confides in friends who have troubling relationship issues of their own.

title: Chalay Thay Saath
description: Beautiful and adventurous doctor Resham meets a handsome Chinese backpacker named Adam while traveling with friends on a journey of self-discovery.

title: Chappaquiddick
description: Senator Ted Kennedy watches his future unravel in the wake of an infamous car crash as family and allies vie to protect his reputation.

title: Chasing the Dragon
description: In corrupt, British-colonized Hong Kong, a mainland Chinese immigrant rises to the top of the city's drug underworld with the help of a notorious cop.

title: Chocolate City: Vegas Strip
description: The exotic dancers from Chocolate City get back together for a trip to Las Vegas and a chance at $500,000 in prize money.

title: Christmas in the Heartland
description: Two girls realize they're both visiting grandparents they’ve never met and decide to switch places to see how the other half lives.

title: Christmas Inheritance
description: To inherit her father's company, socialite Ellen must first visit his small hometown, where she learns the value of hard work and helping others.

title: CIA: Comrade in America
description: A young man in Kerala has two weeks to stop the woman he loves from a fixed marriage in the U.S., but he doesn't have the papers to get there.

title: Coin Heist
description: When a crisis threatens to destroy their high school, four teens hatch a daring plan to raise $10 million. Step one? Breaking into the U.S. Mint.

title: Daffedar
description: A retired government worker continues to dedicate himself to public service, but his principled ways soon clash with those of his extravagant sons.

title: Dance Academy: The Comeback
description: In this adaptation of the TV series, Tara recovers from injury and pursues a career in the U.S., where she grapples with love and professional rejection.

title: Dayveon
description: Following the shooting death of his older brother, a depressed and aimless 13-year-old boy falls in with a gang in rural Arkansas.

title: Deidra & Laney Rob a Train
description: With their mother in jail and bills piling up, ambitious small-town teens Deidra and Laney plot a series of train robberies to keep themselves afloat.

title: Desire
description: A young woman arrives at her estranged sister's wedding to mend fences but falls prey to lust when she meets the groom.

title: Dhh
description: Convinced only a miracle can save them from failing school exams, a trio of friends seek help from a magician. To their surprise, he gamely complies.

title: Dushman
description: An Indian hotel waiter forms an unlikely bond with a Pakistani colleague when the establishment’s criminal owner threatens to ruin both their lives.

title: El Camino Christmas
description: Stuck in a liquor store during an alleged robbery, a group of strangers shares hidden truths and forms an unexpected bond on Christmas Eve.

title: El silencio es bienvenido
description: As a teen languishes during a spiritless road trip, she learns of the troubles in her parents' marriage as a crisis in her country looms.

title: Face 2 Face
description: Two former friends, who now live far apart, learn about each other's insecurities and secrets over a series of video chats.

title: Familiye
description: An ex-con struggles to take care of his two brothers, a gambling addict and a young man with Down syndrome, after being released from prison.

title: Fanatyk
description: As a son deals with his own struggles, he must calm his father's obsession with fishing before his outlandish behavior ruins the entire family.

title: First They Killed My Father
description: A 5-year-old girl embarks on a harrowing quest for survival amid the sudden rise and terrifying reign of the Khmer Rouge in Cambodia.

title: Forgotten
description: When his abducted brother returns seemingly a different man with no memory of the past 19 days, Jin-seok chases after the truth behind the kidnapping.

title: From Japan to Egypt
description: After his wife relocates to her home country of Japan, an Egyptian man – and father of two rambunctious kids – tries to win her back.

title: FullMetal Alchemist
description: While alchemist Edward Elric searches for a way to restore his brother Al's body, the military government and mysterious monsters are watching closely.

title: Furthest Witness
description: Kyle helps people disappear, but when a crazed killer starts hunting down his latest client, he has to decide what he's willing to do to keep her safe.

title: İstanbul Kırmızısı
description: Upon his return to Istanbul, an expat writer-editor finds himself stranded inside a web of tangled relationships after his filmmaker friend vanishes.

title: Gabriel and the Mountain
description: In a drama based on a true story, Brazilian backpacker Gabriel Buchmann spends his gap year exploring Africa. Why does he die in the Malawi mountains?

title: Galih dan Ratna
description: Sparks fly between the new girl at school and the misfit with a passion for music. Yet the world threatens to put a stop to their innocent love song.

title: God's Own Country
description: In Yorkshire, a withdrawn gay farmer begins a torrid affair with a Romanian migrant worker who shows him the depths of his capacity for affection.

title: Good Time
description: After spearheading an ill-fated bank robbery, a man must get his mentally challenged younger brother out of jail while eluding his own capture.

title: Gook
description: Amidst the looting and chaos of the LA riots, two Korean-American brothers fight to save their struggling shoe store while contemplating their future.

title: Gurgaon
description: When the daughter of a wealthy family returns from college, she gets a frosty welcome from her brother, who has problems – and plans – of his own.

title: Hakkunde
description: A perpetually unemployed graduate desperately leaves his city for a potential opportunity until a roadblock threatens to derail his chance at a career.

title: Half Girlfriend
description: Small-town Madhav falls for big-city Riya and wants her to be his girlfriend. But she views their relationship differently, and suggests a compromise.

title: Heaven Without People
description: From long resentments to deep secrets, an overdue family reunion erupts with drama when the matriarch makes a disturbing discovery.

title: History of Joy
description: The life of a high-flying law student takes a drastic turn when a bout of misfortune changes his status in society for good.

title: Holy Camp!
description: In this musical comedy, two rebellious teen girls who love electronic music have a life-changing brush with the divine at a camp run by nuns.

title: Hombanna
description: In the forests of Karnataka, a farmer and his community face eviction from the land when they get caught in the currents of socio-political change.

title: Hostiles
description: After a long career battling the Cheyenne, a U.S. Army captain is ordered to safely escort the tribe's most influential chief to his Montana homeland.

title: Hot Sweet Sour
description: In love since childhood, a couple separates to pursue different paths but makes a pact to marry each other in five years if they are still single.

title: I Don't Feel at Home in This World Anymore
description: A timid nursing assistant gets a new lease on life when she and a neighborhood loner track down the degenerates who broke into her house.

title: 반드시 잡는다
description: After people in his town start turning up dead, a grumpy landlord is visited by a man who recounts an unsolved serial murder case from 30 years ago.

title: III Smoking Barrels
description: In three stories set in Northeast India, a child goes on the run, a young adult falls in with the wrong crowd and a desperate man turns to crime.

title: In Line
description: A convicted murderer gets out of prison and reunites with his wife, who is plotting revenge against him after years of physical and emotional abuse.

title: In Search of Fellini
description: A naive and sheltered young woman embarks on a whimsical adventure across Italy in the hopes of meeting director Federico Fellini.

title: Incomplete
description: A man returns to his childhood hometown, where he meets the happily married woman he once jilted, while his best friend endures a more volatile union.

title: Indian Horse
description: Stripped of his heritage at a residential school, an indigenous student finds refuge on the rink when he discovers a passion for hockey.

title: Invisible
description: After learning she's pregnant, a teen grapples with the consequences while trying to go about her life as if nothing has changed.

title: Inxeba
description: At an initiation ritual for the young men of his Xhosa community, a closeted factory hand meets a Johannesburg teen who discovers his best-kept secret.

title: Ittefaq
description: A homemaker and a writer are prime suspects – and the only witnesses – in a double murder, and it’s up to one detective to uncover the elusive truth.

title: Jindua
description: An Indian man in Canada marries a local citizen to legalize his immigration status. The only problem? His girlfriend isn't thrilled about his new wife.

title: Kaabil
description: The happy life of a young blind couple is shattered when the wife is raped and corrupt police won't help, sending the husband on a quest for revenge.

title: Kaaliyan
description: An aggressive, wayward fisherman abandons his wife and daughters, who grow up to face the consequences of their father's mistakes.

title: Kalki
description: A scientist trying to solve one of the universe's greatest puzzles begins a romance with a much younger colleague that's haunted by a dark secret.

title: Kanavu Variyam
description: Despite doubts from fellow villagers who think he’s crazy, an ambitious dropout commits himself to solving a persistent local electricity crisis.

title: Kartini: Princess of Java
description: A woman of nobility battles patriarchal norms in order to improve educational access for women in early 1900s Indonesian society.

title: Kaviyude Osyath
description: When a late poet leaves behind his property to a young man, the man's brother suspects the poet may have been more than just a family friend.

title: Kings
description: A foster mom and her houseful of kids befriend a bitter neighbor after the Rodney King verdict is handed down in 1992 Los Angeles.

title: Kiss & Cry
description: Faced with a rare form of throat cancer, teen figure skater Carley Allison finds strength in singing for an online audience in this biopic.

title: Kita Kita
description: When a tour guide in Japan goes blind after seeing her fiancé’s infidelity, she befriends a fellow Filipino keen to coax her out of the darkness.

title: Krystal
description: A kid with a heart condition falls for an ex-stripper with a lot of baggage and joins her Alcoholics Anonymous group to catch her attention.

title: Kuldip Patwal: I Didn't Do It!
description: Accused of killing a politician, a local grocer’s fight to prove his innocence reveals his lifelong struggles with injustice leading up to the incident.

title: Kuppivala
description: A young woman talented at traditional dance finds her life changed when her love for a man clashes with the wishes of her father.

title: Lady Bird
description: An intrepid high schooler in Sacramento undergoes the trials of love, family and self-discovery as she dreams of escaping to college on the East Coast.

title: Listen
description: A sound engineer falls for a model but after an unfortunate accident, he fights to save their love by triggering her senses.

title: Loco Love
description: A young man and woman fall in love but are threatened to be torn apart by the tensions between their Latino and Caucasian communities in Arizona.

title: Love and Shukla
description: A sexually inexperienced rickshaw driver struggles to build intimacy with his shy new wife in their tiny, overcrowded quarters.

title: Love Off the Cuff
description: Cherie and Jimmy's relationship is in a rut – until Cherie's estranged father shows up and a woman from Jimmy's past shows up with a hidden agenda.

title: Lucknow Central
description: After being arrested for a crime he didn't commit, an aspiring musician teams up with some of his inmates at Lucknow Central to form a band.

title: Maacher Jhol
description: On his first visit to his home city of Kolkata in 13 years, a Paris-based chef is faced with a cooking challenge that will change his life forever.

title: Mahi NRI
description: A Punjabi man attempts to build a life in London in hopes of impressing his girlfriend’s mother, who insists her daughter marry a man outside of India.

title: Mala Kahich Problem Nahi
description: With their relationship running on autopilot, a discontent husband and wife must confront their issues while on a trip with the extended family.

title: Mandobasar Galpo
description: With the assistance of a psychiatrist, an acclaimed filmmaker struggles to come to terms with a mysterious romantic trauma.

title: Manje Bistre
description: While prepping for a family wedding, a young man falls for his sister’s friend, who has already been promised to someone else.

title: Mantostaan
description: Four stories by writer Sadaat Hasan Manto culminate in a single gruesome drama that's set during the partitioning of the Indian subcontinent.

title: Mantra
description: An Indian business owner struggles to keep his company afloat amid global competition while trying to make up for lost time with his family.

title: Manusangada
description: When caste discrimination prevents a villager from giving his deceased father a rightful burial, he takes his fight for equality to court.

title: Match
description: After living with a criminal father, two brothers on different paths head for a direct collision when an intriguing woman enters both of their lives.

title: Mater
description: A single man in his 30s overwhelmed by his domineering mother meets a lesbian couple willing to go to extreme lengths to have a child.

title: Meditation Park
description: An elderly immigrant matriarch from Hong Kong finally begins to break out of her shell of isolation when she suspects her husband of infidelity.

title: Meet the In-Laws
description: When their respective parents oppose their union, a newly engaged couple learns that the reasons for pushback run deeper than just tribal differences.

title: Meghnadbodh Rohoshyo
description: A professor mysteriously vanishes, leaving behind a host of suspects, a shadowy history and a clue: the anonymous birthday gift of a Bengali classic.

title: Melle
description: After recovering from a tragic experience, a young woman makes a journey to her father's homeland and falls in love with a kind-hearted doctor.

title: Memoir of a Murderer
description: Hiding his own murderous past, a man suffering from Alzheimer's must protect his daughter from her boyfriend, who he suspects is also a serial killer.

title: Menashe
description: A year after his wife's death, a widower faces pressure from his Hasidic community to give up his son for adoption unless he finds a new partner.

title: Mersal
description: A detective arrests a doctor for crimes targeting medical professionals but later finds the real culprit in a tale of revenge, corruption and magic.

title: Milada
description: Politician and human rights campaigner Milada Horáková battles against all odds to defend her beliefs in a Czechoslovakia under Communist rule.

title: Minnaminugu the FireFly
description: A nameless widow juggles multiple jobs to support her daughter’s decision to study abroad, only to discover that she has other plans.

title: Molly's Game
description: Former Olympian Molly Bloom ran a high-stakes poker game for the stars – until her lofty lifestyle nearly sent her to prison.

title: Mom
description: After her stepdaughter is sexually assaulted at a party, a furious mother sets out to destroy the lives of the four perpetrators who walked away free.

title: Mubarakan
description: Chaos ensues after two orphaned twin brothers raised apart team up with their eccentric, unmarried uncle to find a solution to their romantic woes.

title: Mudbound
description: Two Mississippi families – one black, one white – confront the brutal realities of prejudice, farming and friendship in a divided World War II era.

title: Muramba
description: A young man and his parents ponder the reasons behind the recent breakdown of a relationship he was in – and the possibility of reconciliation.

title: Mustang Island
description: After being dumped on New Year's Eve, Bill pursues his ex-girlfriend to an off-season Gulf Coast beach town, but things get complicated along the way.

title: My Daddy is in Heaven
description: After the sudden loss of her husband, a mother has a crisis of faith and struggles to keep her life together for the sake of her daughter and herself.

title: My Ex & Whys
description: Popular blogger Cali is hired for a marketing campaign alongside another viral sensation: her ex-boyfriend Gio, who's intent on winning her back.

title: My Happy Family
description: A middle-aged wife and mother of two shocks her traditional, multigenerational Georgian household when she announces she's going to live by herself.

title: Newness
description: Martin and Gabi try to form a relationship after meeting through a hookup app, but when boredom creeps in, they seek out an unconventional solution.

title: Nibunan
description: With numbers written on a doll as their only clue, three officers of the law track down a psychotic killer, unearthing dark secrets along the way.

title: No One Will Ever Know
description: A mother and young son escape into their own imaginations to ignore the reality of their lives in rural Mexico.

title: November Criminals
description: Dissatisfied with the police’s progress, a teen and his best friend investigate their classmate's murder, treading down a dark path to the uneasy truth.

title: Okja
description: A gentle giant and the girl who raised her are caught in the crossfire between animal activism, corporate greed and scientific ethics.

title: On Body and Soul
description: Two shy and socially awkward co-workers in Budapest form a special bond through a mysterious mystic connection that manifests in a dream.

title: Orbiter 9
description: A woman who's been alone on a spaceship her whole life becomes enamored with an engineer who suddenly enters her life and upends her universe.

title: Oru Vishsheshapetta Biryani Kissa
description: When the village's biryani cook unexpectedly passes, a widow steps up to the plate and takes on new delectable challenges.

title: OtherLife
description: After inventing a drug that induces time-compressed virtual realities, young Ren grapples with partner Sam over how to use their powerful creation.

title: Our Shining Days
description: In a battle of the bands, a percussions student and her musical kindred spirits set out to prove the merits of Chinese folk against the Western canon.

title: Our Souls at Night
description: After widowed neighbors Addie and Louis begin sleeping in bed together platonically to alleviate their loneliness, a real romance begins to blossom.

title: Paathi
description: A face painter for Theyyam rituals who is himself disfigured conceals his guilt over the fact that he performs abortions as a medical practitioner.

title: Pandigai
description: Looking for a way out of his impoverished life, a lowly hotel waiter joins an underground fight club. Then he needs a way out of that.

title: Pareeth Pandaari
description: As the parents of three unmarried daughters, a humble cook and his wife contend with the challenges of matchmaking and social expectations.

title: Phullu
description: Struck by the lack of clean resources for menstruating women in his village, a jobless loafer braves social stigmas to create low-cost sanitary napkins.

title: Pickpockets
description: Aspiring teen thieves learn what it takes to be successful pickpockets on the streets of Bogotá from a master in the arts of trickery and deception.

title: Pimpal
description: As a lonely widower prepares to leave India to live with his children in America, he looks back on past memories and unfinished business.

title: Pop, Lock 'n Roll"
description: An ambitious hip-hop dancer jeopardizes his rising career when his affections for an ominous producer's wife threatens to stomp out all of his success.

title: Posesif
description: A student diver risks her scholastic future and relationship with her father when she dates a moody transfer student consumed by their romance.

title: Potato Potahto
description: A divorced couple decides to continue sharing a home but their already-delicate cohabiting scheme unravels when they begin dating other people.

title: Power Paandi
description: Retired, restless and constantly butting heads with his son, a former stuntman escapes on a road trip that becomes a journey to find his first love.

title: Princess Cyd
description: A teenager moves to Chicago for the summer and finds a poignant mentor in her aunt and a sweet love interest in a girl who works in the neighborhood.

title: Raees
description: After street smart kid Raees rises to become Gujarat's bootlegging king in the 1980s, he tries to balance his life of crime with helping his people.

title: Rangoon
description: During World War II, daredevil star Miss Julia entertains soldiers at the Indo-Burma border, where she's caught up in a web of love and deceit.

title: Rangreza
description: A high-flying rock star and son of a politician falls for a woman from a qawwal family, leading to a love triangle that may consume everyone involved.

title: Red Oleanders Raktokarobi
description: When a theater group stages a production of a Rabindranath Tagore play, they begin to notice parallels between the story and their own lives.

title: Rememory
description: A psychologist is murdered after unveiling a breakthrough invention that extracts memories, spurring a fixated former patient to hunt for answers.

title: Retablo
description: High in the Andes, a teenage boy and his father work together as artisans. But their bond is shattered when the son learns of his father's secret life.

title: Rip Tide
description: Following an embarrassing viral video, a New York model decides to escape from her suffocating existence by visiting her faraway aunt in Australia.

title: Rodney King
description: Roger Guenveur Smith gives voice to the man at the center of the brutal police beating that helped fuel the 1992 LA riots. Spike Lee directs.

title: Rukh
description: Following the untimely death of his father, a young man begins to reconnect with his family while uncovering some difficult truths.

title: Samantaral
description: On a family visit, a young man and his girlfriend set out to discover why his eccentric uncle has been mysteriously confined to one room for years.

title: Samarppanam
description: When a young girl is killed in a suspicious train accident, three very different lives become intertwined in their quest for answers.

title: Same Kind of Different as Me
description: A wealthy couple whose marriage is on the rocks befriends a local homeless man who changes their perspectives in this inspiring true story.

title: Sand Castle
description: After the invasion of Iraq in 2003, a reluctant soldier's platoon is dispatched on a dangerous mission to repair a hostile village's water system.

title: Sarvopari Palakkaran
description: In the course of a human trafficking investigation, a conservative cop crosses paths with an artist-activist in a clash of worldviews.

title: Sat Shri Akaal England
description: After several failed attempts to obtain a visa, a man desperate to escape Punjab pays a British woman to marry him so he can move to England.

title: Saturday Church
description: A teen struggling with gender identity and family tensions seeks hope and support in New York City's underground LGBTQ ballroom community.

title: Secret Superstar
description: A talented teenage singer-songwriter living amid domestic abuse becomes a YouTube sensation after a video in which she hides her identity goes viral.

title: Septiembre, un llanto en silencio"
description: After a terrorist attack in Guatemala, a baby is rendered deaf and motherless and her father is left to raise her alone.

title: Seven Sundays
description: A dying father asks his busy and grown children to spend their Sundays with him, forcing his family to confront their issues before it's too late.

title: Shimmer Lake
description: Unfolding in reverse time, this darkly comic crime thriller follows a local sheriff hunting three bank robbery suspects, one of whom is his brother.

title: Shot Caller
description: Trying to go straight, a once-successful businessman fresh out of prison is forced to orchestrate a brazen crime or risk his family.

title: Shubh Aarambh
description: As her own wedding looms on the horizon, a marriage counselor strives to save her future in-laws' crumbling relationship.

title: Shuddhi
description: An American woman on a revenge mission travels to India and befriends two journalists seeking justice for violent crimes against women.

title: Sicilian Ghost Story
description: When officials are slow to investigate a mysterious disappearance, a teen girl searches the dark woods on the outskirts of town for the boy she loves.

title: Singularity
description: Nearly a century after artificial intelligence tried to eradicate people from Earth, two survivors search for a human enclave rumored to still exist.

title: Skins
description: Deformed, disfigured characters must find a way to deal with society shunning their differences in this darkly comic social drama.

title: Slam
description: Teen father-to-be Sam imagines his future as a young parent and finds a surprising mentor while reading about his idol, pro skateboarder Tony Hawk.

title: Slow Country
description: Desperate to leave a life of prostitution, a teenage mother attempts to outsmart her ruthless boss who is determined to keep his prized asset.

title: Small Crimes
description: After serving a six-year prison sentence, an ex-cop tries to rebuild his life in his hometown, but gets caught up in the fallout from his past.

title: Some Freaks
description: A one-eyed boy and plus-sized girl form a deep connection. But following a brief separation, they reunite as different people.

title: Sparring
description: A middle-aged boxer with a mixed record becomes a champion's sparring partner while dreaming of one last chance to end his career with a victory.

title: Speech & Debate
description: Fed up with the hypocrisy of the adults around them, three creative high school misfits revive an old debate club as a way to fight back.

title: SPF-18
description: The arrival of an enigmatic struggling musician in Malibu shakes the ground beneath the feet of a teenage girl and her surfer boyfriend.

title: Sun Dogs
description: Rejected by the Marines but eager to serve his country after 9/11, a simple-minded man performs amateur terrorist surveillance with a young runaway.

title: Sunday's Illness
description: Decades after being abandoned as a young child, Chiara finds her mother and asks her to spend 10 days together in a remote location.

title: Super Dark Times
description: A tragic accident drives a wedge between two teenage boys, threatening a friendship that had seemed firm and unshakeable.

title: Surga Yang Tak Dirindukan 2
description: In this sequel to the award-winning 2015 film, Pras, Arini and Meirose face new challenges that could change the dynamic of their unique love triangle.

title: Sweet Virginia
description: In a remote Alaskan town reeling from a sudden triple murder, a former rodeo champ befriends a lone newcomer with a violent occupation.

title: Taramani
description: A traditional man and an independent woman share a connection, but they must learn to navigate their vastly different experiences and expectations.

title: Tatu
description: Doubting her future as a nun, a woman attempts to have a child, triggering a mystic tribal prophecy that could force her to make a godly sacrifice.

title: Temporada de Caza
description: Animosity gives way to love and forgiveness when an angry teenager reunites with his estranged biological father in the wilds of Patagonia.

title: The Art of Loving
description: During Communist rule, a Polish gynecologist and sexologist defies taboo and fights to publish her groundbreaking book on love and sex.

title: The Bachelors
description: After the death of his wife, a teacher and his son move to a new city, where emotional connections with two women help them begin to heal.

title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown
description: After his longtime partner is assassinated, a slow-footed cowboy sets out to find his killer and uncovers a conspiracy engineered by some powerful men.

title: The Bittersweet
description: As a killer stalks the streets, a troubled young courier suspects that a doctor may be the long-lost sister he hasn't seen since childhood.

title: The Black Prince
description: After being exiled to England as a child, a Punjabi prince struggles to return to his homeland and his Sikh faith in this historical drama.

title: The Breadwinner
description: A courageous 11-year-old Afghan girl disguises herself as a boy and takes on odd jobs to provide for her family when her father is arrested.

title: The Bridge
description: A Yoruba prince and a young lady from a prominent Igbo family face tribal prejudice and parental pressure when they secretly wed.

title: The Bros
description: Reunited in their hometown for their father's funeral, two self-interested brothers meet a peculiar woman who shares a huge secret about their family.

title: The Cakemaker
description: When a German baker travels to Jerusalem in search of his dead male lover’s family, his growing involvement with them may expose his truth.

title: The Case for Christ
description: Bothered by his wife's unyielding belief in Christianity, an investigative reporter sets out to use verifiable facts to poke holes in her faith.

title: The Cell
description: A special operations officer vows to get revenge against the terrorist who killed his friend in a brutal attack.

title: The Clapper
description: A newcomer ekes out a living in LA as a professional audience member on infomercials, but life gets complicated when he's thrust into the spotlight.

title: The Climb
description: A young Senegalese-French man from humble roots sets out to climb Mount Everest to impress the woman he loves – and slowly becomes a media sensation.

title: The Death of Stalin
description: The death of Russian dictator Joseph Stalin throws the Soviet Union into comic chaos as his ambitious but addled ministers maneuver to succeed him.

title: The Desert Bride
description: While traveling across Argentina to a new job, a longtime maid encounters a salesman who opens her eyes to life's beauty and possibilities.

title: The Disaster Artist
description: Aspiring actor Greg moves to Los Angeles with his strange friend Tommy, then agrees to star in his movie. Things start weird and get a lot weirder.

title: The Discovery
description: A scientist whose proof of an afterlife caused a rash of suicides forges ahead with his research, while his disapproving son falls for a troubled woman.

title: The Florida Project
description: A mischievous 6-year-old finds the magic in her own circumstances while living with her troubled mom in a budget motel near Disney World.

title: The Giant
description: In 1843, crippled Martin returns from war to his Basque hometown and finds his brother has grown into a giant, which they turn into a circus act.

title: The Good Catholic
description: A young priest’s faith is tested when he finds himself attracted to a woman he meets at confession and his ideals are shaken to the core.

title: The Healer
description: A handyman who has hit rock bottom agrees to live with his distant uncle, who insists that his ability to fix things extends beyond the repair shop.

title: The Heyday of the Insensitive Bastards
description: An all-star cast brings to life the short stories of author Robert Boswell in this anthology series of vignettes set in modern-day America.

title: The Keeping Hours
description: Years after the death of their only child and subsequent divorce, a couple discovers that their son's ghost continues to inhabit their former home.

title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
description: A surgeon's carefully curated life edges toward disaster when a troubled teenage boy with mysterious motives begins to impose himself on his family.

title: The last hour
description: In this compelling true story, two Peruvian detectives go undercover to locate and capture the elusive leader of the Shining Path guerrilla army.

title: The Lost Brother
description: While settling the affairs of his murdered mother and brother, a man partners with a local thug in a life insurance scam, putting him on a dark path.

title: The Lovers
description: On the verge of divorce, a middle-aged couple, each involved in a serious affair, rethink their marriage and the meaning of love and fidelity.

title: The Mayor
description: With the presidency in mind, the incumbent mayor of Seoul runs for an unprecedented third term – and will stop at nothing to keep his secrets hidden.

title: The Meyerowitz Stories (New and Selected)
description: Grudges and rivalries abound as three adult siblings converge in New York to contend with their prickly artist father – and his fading legacy.

title: The Most Hated Woman in America
description: This drama follows the controversial life of outspoken atheist Madalyn Murray O'Hair, from her landmark court battles to her infamous abduction.

title: The Motive
description: An aspiring writer with no imagination seeks inspiration for his novel by manipulating the lives of his neighbors so that he can write about them.

title: The Music of Silence
description: Based on the autobiography by tenor Andrea Bocelli, this musical biopic chronicles his life from his bumpy childhood to his meteoric rise to fame.

title: The Ottoman Lieutenant
description: As World War I looms, an American nurse travels to the Ottoman Empire on a medical mission, where she clashes with a dashing lieutenant.

title: The Pirates of Somalia
description: An aspiring journalist travels to Somalia in hopes of making a name for himself by covering dangerous pirates and hijackers.

title: The Price of Success
description: Struggling to balance family ties and a career, a rising comedian of Parisian banlieue roots learns the true price of fame.

title: The Prison
description: A cop-turned-convict discovers a crime syndicate inside a prison lorded over by an inmate crime boss – and joins in on their nightly heists.

title: The Show
description: A disillusioned reality TV host and an idealistic producer are lured by their network into producing a show in which participants kill themselves.

title: The Tribes of Palos Verdes
description: When a move to an exclusive seaside community sends her mother and twin brother into a downward spiral, teenager Medina finds solace in surfing.

title: The Wishing Tree
description: Five children living on the edge of a forest band together to save a magical wishing tree from destruction and find their own paths to happiness.

title: The Workshop
description: In an old shipyard town in France, sociopolitical tensions beset a writing workshop where the instructor notices a student with a dark side.

title: Theeram
description: An auto rickshaw driver harbors a deep affection for a young woman, but his troubled past threatens to stand between them.

title: Thi Mai
description: Along with her two friends, a determined woman travels to Vietnam to bring home the baby her recently deceased daughter had planned to adopt.

title: Thug Life
description: A get-rich-quick scheme goes awry when a group of friends stumbles onto a dangerous conspiracy and wind up getting mistaken for the bad guys.

title: Thumper
description: After moving to a hardscrabble suburban California town, a young woman becomes dangerously entangled with a local drug enterprise.

title: Tikli and Laxmi Bomb
description: Two frustrated sex workers cut out the middlemen from their business affairs and start a cooperative that's run entirely by women.

title: To the Bone
description: Ellen, a 20-year-old with anorexia nervosa, goes on a harrowing, sometimes funny journey of self-discovery at a group home run by an unusual doctor.

title: Toilet: Ek Prem Katha
description: On her first day of marriage, a woman leaves her husband upon learning his home lacks a toilet, sparking a quixotic quest to acquire modern sanitation.

title: Tramps
description: Pulled into a shady briefcase swap for different reasons, young strangers Danny and Ellie spend an eventful night together when the deal goes wrong.

title: Treasures from the Wreck of the Unbelievable
description: This cinematic journey into the waters off East Africa chronicles the story behind artist Damien Hirst's massive exhibition of oceanic treasures.

title: True to the Game
description: When a drug kingpin looking to go legit falls for a Philadelphia college student, it doesn't take long for his dangerous world to bleed into her life.

title: Uncertain Glory
description: When Lluís, a disinterested Spanish soldier, meets Carlana, he falls quickly in love, but soon discovers that Carlana's true passion is power.

title: Union Leader
description: Toxic conditions and a corrupt union leader prompt a chemical plant worker and earnest family man to fight for justice for his fellow laborers.

title: Urvi
description: After getting tricked into working at a brothel, a medical student joins forces with two of her co-workers to fight their unscrupulous exploiters.

title: Verónica
description: A reclusive psychologist agrees to treat a patient – whose therapist is missing – at her remote cabin, where the women test each other's boundaries.

title: Verses of Love 2
description: Now a lecturer in Edinburgh, Fahri tries to begin a new chapter as the love of his life, Aisha, volunteers in the Gaza Strip. Have they moved on?

title: Viceroy's House
description: As viceroy Lord Mountbatten arrives in Delhi to oversee a transfer of power from Britain to India in 1947, war looms between religious factions.

title: Viswasapoorvam Mansoor
description: When a mother and her daughter arrive to stay in his home in Kerala, a young Muslim man becomes torn between love, faith and clashing political views.

title: Walk Away from Love
description: Heartbroken from her last relationship, an attorney is wary of falling in love again. But crossing paths with an ex upends her plans to finally move on.

title: Walking Out
description: A suburban teen goes hunting with his estranged father. When a mishap with a bear occurs, he must his use his survival skills to save them both.

title: War Machine
description: When a proud general is tasked with winning an unpopular war, he takes the challenge head-on, not knowing that hubris may be his own worst enemy.

title: What a Wonderful Family!
description: In a large family living under one roof, a storm brews when the matriarch requests a divorce from her husband on their 50th anniversary.

title: Withdrawn
description: Unable to pay bills and unwilling to change his slacker lifestyle, twentysomething Aaron hatches a defrauding scheme when he finds a lost credit card.

title: Wives on Strike: The Revolution
description: After a woman is severely beaten at home, her strong-willed friends take a stand against their husbands to seek justice for domestic abuse victims.

title: Woodshock
description: Shattered after her mother's death, a woman floats away from reality under the effect of a potent, hallucinatory drug as her life decays into chaos.

title: You Get Me
description: alive.
